'''Skin Pack 2''', named '''Skin Pack 2 - Classic''' {{in|bedrock}}, is a [[skin pack]] that includes 43 skins (originally 45) referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games.

== Skins ==
Bedrock Edition includes the theme name in front of a skin's name e.g. Minecraft - Enderman
